question: Which bank offers a personal loans for their customer at ATMs?
explanation: ICICI Bank has launched a facility whereby its existing salaried customers can avail personal loans at ATMs. These customers can get pre-qualified personal loans up to 15 lakhs in their savings account instantly based on pre-checked CIBIL scores and instant transfer of the money to the customer's account. The facility also incorporates an additional level of authentication to make the security of the offering robust.
